unnormalised: Is this the beginning of a new Bollywood romance? Ishaan was previously linked to actress Kiara Advani, but that fizzled out faster than a roadside lemonade on a hot Delhi day. Rhea, meanwhile, has been focusing on her interior design business, "Desi Dreams," based out of Juhu.
